p: Griffithsin has antiviral effects against HCV and HIV in vitro [96], [97]. It is a red-alga-derived lectin, which binds to oligosaccharides on the surface of various viral glycoproteins, including HIV glycoprotein 120 and SARS-CoV spike glycoprotein [71]. Besides, it can inhibit virus entry, reverse transcriptase activity, integrase activity, and protease activity [98]. So, it might be effective against SARS-CoV-2, but further investigation is needed.
